title: Ma po tofu
ingredients: ['500g soft tofu, cut into 1cm cubes', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '100ml vegetable oil', '2 spring onions, roughly chopped', '2cm piece root ginger, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons Sichuan peppercorns', '150g minced pork', '20g doubanjiang (spicy chilli bean paste)', '2 teaspoons rice wine', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste']
